mapper.select: select MAX(RIGHT(code,4)) from ST_RDRecord where code like '%MD%' and charindex(LEFT('convert(varchar(10),getdate(),120)',7),code)>0
select MAX(RIGHT(code,4)) from ST_RDRecord where code like '%MC%' and charindex(LEFT('convert(varchar(10),getdate(),120)',7),code)>0
